summary: Adds 2 new perks that increase attack speed and give armor penetration.
descriptionHtml:
Edit: Apparently I didn't use correct conditions to check if player is using Swords. Fixed in 1.1 version. Old version has been replaced with new one

[s]First of all I need to test this mod, but it should work. If someone can confirm it works it would be nice. Make a save before applying perk and compare differences.
[/s]
This mod adds 2 completely new perks that work only with swords. Here are the perks and their info:

[b]Zeal
[/b]
- Requires Armsman perk of course and One Handed to be at least 30
- Has 2 levels
- First level increases attack speed by 25% ( requires One Handed at 30 )
- Second level increases attack speed by 50% ( requires One Handed at 50 )

[b]Armor Piercing[/b]

- Requires Zeal perk and One Handed 60+
- Has 2 levels
- First level ignores 25% of armor ( requires One Handed 60+ )
- Second level ignores 50% of armor ( requires One Handed 90+ )
author: Husic Jasmin
